name: parse-link
description: Unified URL parsing API in the browser and node
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.build-component-test: component build -a && cp build/build.js test/component.js && cat test/index.js >> test/component.js
scripts.build: npm run build-browser-test && npm run build-component-test
